availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas A. Berryman (Owen County, Kentucky, attorney, chair of bd of trustees for Owenton)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, attorney and city trustee. New Kent County, Virginia, native. Married to Lucy H. Berryman. Attorney in Owen County in 1860. Chairman of the board of trustees for the city of Owenton in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 54.
"Thomas A. Berryman (1801-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial #19682549, accessed April 12, 2018, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19682549.
